EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 6 - AirScale RNC webinar on demand
EmailTemplate.subject: Future-proof your radio network controller
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Serve billions of 3G users for years to come, while you prepare for the future AirScale Radio Network Controller <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2208.Whyinvestingin3Gwillpaydividendsfarintothefuture.html]]> The first true cloud-based RNC will boost your business 3.4 billion people will still be using 3G in 2020. Don’t lose their business. Put your radio network controllers in the cloud to meet any demand and future-proof your network. See the webinar <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2208.Whyinvestingin3Gwillpaydividendsfarintothefuture.html]]> ► The next step in network controllers is here in the shape of this flexible cloud-based RNC.
With Nokia AirScale RNC, you will be ready to serve any 3G demand, while also protecting your investment by re-using the same data center hardware for other purposes. © 2016 Nokia.
